modShortDescription: Adds 3 in light sabres (red,blue,green) because, well, folks asked for them. Adapted the particle from the lightsabre made by Starvation's own Pacco.
modDescription:
Adds 3 in light sabres (red,blue,green) because, well, folks asked for them. Adapted the particle from the lightsabre made by Starvation’s own Pacco, may he rest in peace. Otherwise it all new.

Recharge them when “broken” using a gem made from a rough diamond and a battery. They are OP so they wear out sooner than you would hope, especially L1 devices.

**Changelog**  
Updated for latest experimental.

**[Download](https://yehonal.github.io/DownGit/#/home?url=https://github.com/7D2D/A19Mods/tree/master/LightSabres)** for A19  
**[Download](https://yehonal.github.io/DownGit/#/home?url=https://github.com/7D2D/A18Mods/tree/master/LightSabres)** for A18

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/8400-xyths-modlet-collection/).

**Credits:** [Xyth](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/xyth/)
